name: SerkeDemo
description:
Serke is a hack and slash action game where you take down computer viruses that are rushing to you with exciting action.

It was built for testing before the release of the official demo and for exhibiting in indie craft2021.

-How to operate-

Keyboard and mouse

Move: A.D.S.W

Attack: Left mouse click

Skill Selection: Q. E

Dodge: Space

Weapon Change: Shift

Weapon Guide

-sword-

Basic Attack: Left mouse click X 4

Skill 1: Press the Q key

Skill 2: Press E key X 3

-rifle-

Basic Attack: Left-click to fire one at a time, press and hold to fire continuously

Load: R key

Skill 1: Press the Q key

Skill 2: Press E key and left mouse click X 3

-halberd-

Basic Attack: Left mouse click X 3

Skill 1: Q key

Skill 2: When you press the E key, a strong additional attack occurs when you release your hand after charging after a single attack.

-H/W-

Basic Attack: Left mouse click X 4

Load: R key

Skill1: Press the Q key to change the attack method.

              마우스 왼쪽 버튼을 클릭하면 마우스 커서가있는 곳에 폭탄이 발사됩니다.

skill2 : 충전 청구 E 키를 누르세요.

             손을 놓으면 공격합니다.
